titles: Astronomia Britannica exhibiting the doctrine of the sphere, and theory of the planets decimally by trigonometry, and by tables : fitted for the meridian of London ... / by John Newton ...
author: Newton, John, 1622-1678.
publisher: Printed for the author by R. and W. Leybourn, and are to be sold by Thomas Piercepoint ...,
notes: Pts. 2 and 3 each have special t.p.'s and are dated 1656; pt. 3 is separately paged.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
